item.title: Readings
item.description: The textbooks for this class are: Brealey, R., and S. C. Myers. Principles of Corporate Finance. New York, NY: McGraw-Hill/Irwin. ISBN: 0073368695. Higgins, R. C. Analysis for Financial Management. New York, NY: McGraw-Hill/Irwin. ISBN: 0077297652. Part I: Financing LECÂ # TOPICS READINGS 1 Lecture: Introduction Background Reading: Higgins. Interpreting Financial Statements. Chapter 1. Higgins. Evaluating Financial Performance. Chapter 2. Brealey and Myers. An Overview of Corporate Financing. Chapter 14. 2 Case: Wilson Lumber 1 Piper, Thomas R.
